summary: Completed comprehensive backend authentication API testing for Medious app. All authentication endpoints are working correctly with the ngrok tunnel URL.
passed_tests: API Health Check - Backend accessible via ngrok tunnel
User Registration - Valid registration with email/password works
User Registration - Duplicate email properly rejected
User Login - Valid credentials return JWT token and user data
User Login - Invalid password properly rejected with 401
User Login - Non-existent email properly rejected with 401
Token Verification - Valid JWT token returns user data
Token Verification - Invalid token properly rejected with 401
Forgot Password - Existing email processed successfully
Forgot Password - Non-existent email handled gracefully
Supabase OAuth Sync - New OAuth user creation works
Supabase OAuth Sync - Existing email properly rejected
User Profile - Authenticated user can retrieve profile
User Profile - Unauthenticated request properly rejected
User Profile - Authenticated user can update profile
Test Credentials - newuser@test.com login works correctly
